item.title: 特朗普政府采取行动取消阻止解除美联储理事库克职务的裁决
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的政府周四请求联邦上诉法院允许特朗普暂时解除美联储理事丽莎-库克的职务，因为一名法官称他可能缺乏这样做的理由。【原文：President Donald Trump's administration on Thursday asked a federal appeals court to allow Trump to remove Federal Reserve Governor Lisa Cook from office for now after a judge said he likely lacked cause to do so.】

item.title: 巴西航空工业公司首席执行官表示，预计到 2028 年每年交付 100 架商用喷气机
item.description: 巴西航空工业公司首席执行官告诉路透社记者，该公司预计在2028年达到每年交付100架商用飞机的目标。【原文：Embraer expects to reach 100 commercial aircraft deliveries per year in 2028, its CEO told Reuters, adding that supply chain issues will likely keep the Brazilian planemaker from hitting that mark sooner.】

item.title: 美国能源部长淡化气候风险，华盛顿寻求欧盟天然气协议
item.description: 美国能源部长克里斯-赖特（Chris Wright）周四在推动华盛顿回归 "常识性能源政策 "时淡化了气候变化的风险，与此同时，特朗普政府努力促进向欧洲和其他盟国出售石油和天然气。【原文：U.S. Energy Secretary Chris Wright downplayed the risks of climate change as he promoted Washington's return to a "commonsense energy policy" on Thursday, while the Trump administration worked to boost oil and gas sales to Europe and other allies.】

item.title: 甲骨文大涨显示人工智能行业对市场的影响力与日俱增
item.description: 华尔街的 "人工智能交易 "推动市场在今年创下历史新高，而甲骨文惊人的股价涨幅又给了投资者一个支持这一交易的理由。【原文：Wall Street's "AI trade" has propelled the market to record highs this year, and Oracle's stunning share-price gains are giving investors another reason to back the trade.】

item.title: 美国起诉优步，指控其残疾歧视
item.description: 美国政府周四起诉优步科技公司（Uber Technologies），指控这家共享出行公司歧视残疾乘客。【原文：The U.S. government on Thursday sued Uber Technologies , accusing the ride-sharing company of discriminating against passengers with disabilities.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，派拉蒙 Skydance 准备竞购埃利森支持的华纳兄弟 Discovery 公司
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周四报道，派拉蒙 Skydance 公司正准备以现金多数出价收购华纳兄弟 Discovery 公司，该公司得到了埃里森家族的支持。【原文：Paramount Skydance is preparing a majority cash bid for Warner Bros Discovery that is backed by the Ellison family, the Wall Street Journal reported on Thursday.】

item.title: 礼来公司就 1.837 亿美元医疗补助欺诈赔偿金提出的上诉败诉
item.description: 联邦上诉法院周四驳回了礼来公司对一名举报律师和药剂师赢得的 1.837 亿美元判决的上诉，该律师和药剂师指控该制药商欺诈医疗补助计划。【原文：A federal appeals court on Thursday rejected Eli Lilly's appeal of an $183.7 million judgment won by a whistleblowing lawyer and pharmacist who accused the drugmaker of defrauding Medicaid.】

item.title: 西南航空转变战略，探索远程航班服务
item.description: 美国西南航空公司首席执行官鲍勃-乔丹（Bob Jordan）周四表示，作为扭亏为盈战略的一部分，公司正在研究长途国际航班和高级机场贵宾室。【原文：Southwest Airlines CEO Bob Jordan said on Thursday the company is looking at long-haul international flights and premium airport lounges as part of its turnaround strategy.】

item.title: 迪尔公司高管称全球贸易紧张局势可能导致巴西销售额下降
item.description: 全球农业机械制造商迪尔公司（Deere & Co.）的一位高管周四表示，由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的关税和南美国家的高利率所带来的全球不确定性，2026年迪尔公司在巴西的销售额可能会下降一位数。【原文：Global agricultural machinery manufacturer Deere & Co.'s sales in Brazil could fall by a single-digit percentage in 2026 amid global uncertainties related to U.S. President Donald Trump's tariffs and high interest rates in the South American country, an executive said on Thursday.】

item.title: 美联储数据显示，第二季度美国家庭净资产反弹至历史新高
item.description: 美联储（Federal Reserve）周四公布的数据显示，由于股市回暖和房地产价格攀升，第二季度美国家庭财富增至创纪录的176.3万亿美元。【原文：U.S. household wealth rose to a record $176.3 trillion in the second quarter on the back of a resurgent stock market and climbing property prices, data from the Federal Reserve showed on Thursday.】

item.title: 独家：消息人士称，温克艾沃斯创办的加密货币交易所双子星的 IPO 超额认购超过 20 倍
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士周四表示，卡梅伦和泰勒-温克艾沃斯创办的加密货币交易所双子座空间站计划在美国首次公开发行股票，目前已获得的订单数量是现有股票数量的 20 倍以上。【原文：Gemini Space Station, the cryptocurrency exchange founded by Cameron and Tyler Winklevoss, has drawn over 20 times as many orders for its planned U.S. initial public offering as there are available shares, people familiar with the matter said on Thursday.】

item.title: 区块链贷款机构 Figure 估值 76 亿美元，股价在纳斯达克首日大涨
item.description: 周四，Figure Technology 公司在纳斯达克首次亮相，股价大涨 44%，估值达 76.2 亿美元，随着数字资产行业逐渐接近主流，加密货币相关公司的首日表现也十分强劲。【原文：Figure Technology was valued at $7.62 billion after its shares jumped 44% in their Nasdaq debut on Thursday, adding to a run of strong first-day performances by crypto-linked firms as the digital-assets industry edges closer to the mainstream.】

item.title: Infosys 批准回购价值 20 亿美元的股票
item.description: 印度第二大 IT 服务提供商 Infosys 周四表示，该公司批准了价值 1,800 亿卢比（20.4 亿美元）的股票回购计划。【原文：India's No.2 IT services provider Infosys approved a share buyback worth 180 billion rupees ($2.04 billion), the company said on Thursday.】

item.title: 摩根大通提拔阿布拉拉赫和约翰逊领导基础设施投资银行业务
item.description: 根据路透社周四看到的一份备忘录，摩根大通任命弗朗西斯科-阿布拉拉赫（Francisco Abularach）和迈克尔-约翰逊（Michael Johnson）为新的全球基础设施投资银行联席主管。【原文：JPMorgan Chase appointed Francisco Abularach and Michael Johnson as its new global co-heads of infrastructure investment banking, according to a memo seen by Reuters on Thursday.】

item.title: 特朗普的印度提名人表示，美国和印度在关税问题上 "差距不大
item.description: 共和党总统唐纳德-特朗普提名的美国驻印度大使周四表示，华盛顿和新德里在关税问题上 "并没有那么大的分歧"。【原文：Republican President Donald Trump's nominee to be the U.S. ambassador to India said on Thursday that Washington and New Delhi are "not that far apart" on tariffs.】

item.title: FDA 专家小组将对人工智能心理健康设备进行评估
item.description: 美国食品和药物管理局将于 11 月召开一次顾问小组会议，研究快速兴起的人工智能数字心理健康设备。【原文：The U.S. Food and Drug Administration will hold an advisory panel meeting in November to examine the fast-emerging class of AI-enabled digital mental health devices.】

item.title: 艾伯维股价创历史新高，关键免疫学药物独占期将至 2037 年
item.description: 周四，艾伯维股价上涨 4%，创下历史新高，因为这家美国制药商表示，预计其免疫学大片药物 Rinvoq 的仿制药竞争将持续到 2037 年，一些分析师认为这一期限将延长四年。【原文：AbbVie shares rose 4% to a record high on Thursday after the U.S. drugmaker said it expected no generic competition for its blockbuster immunology drug Rinvoq until 2037, a four-year extension, according to some analysts.】

item.title: 黎巴嫩内阁向埃隆-马斯克的 "星链 "公司颁发许可证
item.description: 黎巴嫩国家通讯社（NNA）周四称，黎巴嫩内阁向亿万富翁埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）领导的卫星互联网公司 Starlink 颁发了在该国提供互联网服务的许可证。【原文：Lebanon's cabinet granted a licence to Starlink, the satellite internet firm led by billionaire Elon Musk, to provide internet services in the country, the state news agency NNA said on Thursday.】

item.title: 菲拉格慕首席财务官拉图尔辞职，拉莫吉亚担任临时职务
item.description: 意大利奢侈品集团菲拉格慕（Ferragamo）首席财务官皮埃尔-拉图尔（Pierre La Tour）周四表示，在任职一年半之后，他将于 9 月 26 日离职，以寻求新的职业发展机会。【原文：Ferragamo's Chief Financial Officer Pierre La Tour is leaving the company as of September 26, after one and a half years in the role, to pursue new professional opportunities, the Italian luxury group said on Thursday.】

item.title: 古巴首都恢复正常，全国停电后的恢复工作向前推进
item.description: 古巴能源和矿业部周四表示，首都哈瓦那 80% 的地区已经通电，全国大部分能源网在电网崩溃 24 小时后已经恢复供电，970 万居民仍处于黑暗之中。【原文：The Cuban Energy and Mining Ministry said on Thursday 80% of the capital, Havana, had power and most of the country's energy grid had been reestablished 24 hours after it crashed, leaving 9.7 million residents in the dark.】

item.title: 现代汽车首席执行官表示：突击检查后，现代电池工厂至少要推迟 2-3 个月才能投产
item.description: 现代汽车公司首席执行官何塞-穆诺兹（Jose Munoz）周四表示，现代汽车公司共同拥有的一家电池厂在上周遭到移民突袭后，将面临至少两到三个月的延期。【原文：A battery plant co-owned by Hyundai Motor is facing a minimum delay of two to three months following an immigration raid last week, Hyundai's CEO Jose Munoz said Thursday.】

item.title: The Information 报道：阿里巴巴和百度开始使用自有芯片训练人工智能模型
item.description: The Information 周四援引四位直接知情人士的话报道称，中国的阿里巴巴和百度已开始使用内部设计的芯片来训练其人工智能模型，部分取代了英伟达（Nvidia）生产的芯片。【原文：China's Alibaba and Baidu have started using internally designed chips to train their AI models, partly replacing those made by Nvidia , The Information reported on Thursday, citing four people with direct knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 埃里森逼近马斯克成为世界首富
item.description: 甲骨文公司股价大涨，使联合创始人拉里-埃里森（Larry Ellison）更接近世界富豪榜榜首。【原文：Oracle's share surge propels co-founder Larry Ellison closer to the top of the world's richest list.】

item.title: 消息人士称，欧洲央行行长将 12 月视为下一次减息的机会
item.description: 三位消息人士告诉路透社，欧洲央行决策者认为，12月的会议是讨论是否需要再次降息以缓冲欧元区经济受美国关税影响的最现实的时间框架。【原文：European Central Bank policymakers see their December meeting as the most realistic time frame to debate whether an another interest rate cut is needed to buffer the euro zone economy from the impact of U.S. tariffs, three sources told Reuters.】

item.title: 美国联邦贸易委员会对人工智能聊天机器人展开调查
item.description: 美国联邦贸易委员会周四表示，它正在向包括 Alphabet、Meta 和 OpenAI 在内的七家提供面向消费者的人工智能聊天机器人的公司寻求信息，以了解这些公司如何衡量、测试和监控潜在的负面影响。【原文：The U.S. Federal Trade Commission on Thursday said it is seeking information from seven companies including Alphabet , Meta and OpenAI that provide consumer-facing AI-powered chatbots, on how these firms measure, test, and monitor potentially negative impacts.】

item.title: Stellantis 希望通过重新推出 RAM 卡车和吉普切诺基来增加收入
item.description: 新任首席执行官安东尼奥-菲洛萨（Antonio Filosa）周四在开始勾勒斯堪尼亚汽车公司的新业务计划时表示，通过新车型增加收入将是斯堪尼亚未来战略的重要支柱，也是恢复现金流的途径。【原文：Increasing revenues thanks to new models will be a key pillar of Stellantis' future strategy and a way to restore cash generation, new CEO Antonio Filosa said on Thursday as he started to sketch out the automaker's new business plan.】

item.title: 墨西哥总统表示，墨西哥不希望因关税措施引发冲突
item.description: 墨西哥总统克劳迪娅-谢因鲍姆周四表示，墨西哥政府并不希望与包括中国在内的计划提高关税的国家发生冲突。【原文：Mexican President Claudia Sheinbaum on Thursday said her government was not looking for a conflict with countries on which it plans to increase tariffs, including China.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织（IMF）称美国经济出现紧张；需求放缓，就业增长放缓
item.description: 国际货币基金组织（International Monetary Fund）周四表示，美国经济在经历了多年的恢复性增长后正显现出一些压力，国内需求放缓，就业增长放缓。【原文：The U.S. economy is showing some strains after years of resilience, with domestic demand moderating and job growth slowing, the International Monetary Fund said on Thursday.】

item.title: 大众汽车西雅特/Cupra 临时首席执行官：我们有信心很快取得积极成果
item.description: 这是一条突发新闻。全面报道将很快发布。【原文：This is a breaking news story. Full coverage will be available soon.】

item.title: 独家消息：消息人士称，法国阿特米斯公司不会以当前价值退出彪马股份
item.description: 一位接近该公司的消息人士周四告诉路透社，皮纳尔家族控股的、控制着古驰（Gucci）所有者开云集团（Kering）的阿尔忒弥斯公司（Artemis）不会以当前市值出售其持有的运动品牌彪马（Puma）29%的股份，也没有参与交易谈判。【原文：Artemis, the Pinault family's holding that controls Gucci-owner Kering, will not sell its 29% stake in sports brand Puma at the current market value and is not engaged in talks over a deal, a source close to the firm told Reuters on Thursday.】
